snippet: The Leucadia National Corporation is buying the Jefferies Group. | President Obama insists on tax increases for the wealthy. | A behind-the-scenes effort by business leaders could play a role in the tax negotiations. | The Greek government approved a...
abstract: The Leucadia National Corporation is buying the Jefferies Group. | President Obama insists on tax increases for the wealthy. | A behind-the-scenes effort by business leaders could play a role in the tax negotiations. | The Greek government approved a 2013 budget, moving a step closer to getting aid from its foreign creditors.
